2064.subject: HPWE
2064.descrlong: Provides a general introduction to the structure and function of the human body.  Covers basic concepts related to anatomical terminology, cells, tissues, integument, the skeletal muscular, nervous, and the endocrine systems. Also emphasizes interrelationships of organ systems.
